attributes.action: Recognise Hidradenitis Suppurativa (HS) as a serious/debilitating condition
attributes.additional_details:
A chronic painful life changing condition where mental and physical health is dramatically reduced 
Chronic pain daily.  No mobility during flare up
attributes.background: Change the Disability Living Allowance (DLA) & Personal Independence Payment (PIP) application policies towards patients of HS • Acknowledge HS to be eligible for a DLA/PIP award where applicable. Also, with the addition of Hidradenitis Suppurativa as a medical condition in it's own right.

rejection.details:
Disability Allowance and the Personal Independence Payment is paid to people who have a health condition or disability which causes difficulties with daily living or getting around. These benefits are paid based on the difficulties causes by a health condition or disability, but there are not particular conditions which result in these benefits being paid.

The NHS already recognises hidradenitis suppurativa (HS) as a medical condition: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/hidradenitis-suppurativa/

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Provide funding for HS to be researched and treatments made available: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629080
